snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Friday's selections include a prediction that corporations will need to alter their networks to accommodate the new iPad, fascinating pictures...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Friday's selections include a prediction that corporations will need to alter their networks to accommodate the new iPad, fascinating pictures of the interiors of musical instruments, and new ways to dress up laptops and tablets.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Google Slows Book Scanning and a Grim Twitter Picture
